document.heading: Downtown Arena Financing Partnership and Revised Budget Emergency Amendment Act of 2024
To increase, on an emergency basis, the capital construction appropriation in the Fiscal Year 2024 Local Budget Act of 2023 to include funding for the modernization of the downtown arena.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Downtown Arena Financing Partnership and Revised Budget Emergency Amendment Act of 2024".

section.text: The appropriation for capital construction projects set forth in the Fiscal Year 2024 Local Budget Act of 2023, effective August 29, 2023 (D.C. Law 25-47; 70 DCR 9700), is increased by $515,000,000, all of which shall be from local funds, to remain available until expended, to be allocated as follows to the following new capital project:
section.codify:annotation: For the increase by $515,000,000 of the appropriation for capital construction projects set forth in the Fiscal Year 2024 Local Budget Act of 2023 to be allocated to the Downtown Arena Financing Partnership, see Downtown Arena Financing Partnership and Revised Budget Emergency Amendment Act of 2024 (D.C. Law 25-469; 71 DCR 5044).

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement of the Chief Financial Officer as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto) and shall remain in effect for no longer than 90 days, as provided for emergency acts of the Council of the District of Columbia in section 412(a) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 788; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-204.12(a)).
